Support

Need a help?

Stack Overflow

Many developers use Stack Overflow to find a help. Use terragrunt tag to find existing questions or ask your own.

Github Issues

Read through existing issues or post a new one. Github issues is a good place to:

  • report a bug,

  • ask for a help,

  • ask for improvements,

  • to start contributing by solving simple issues.

Commercial support

If you need help with Terragrunt or anything else related to infrastructure or DevOps, Gruntwork offers Commercial Support via Slack, email, and phone/video. If you’re already a Gruntwork customer, hop on Slack and ask away! If not, subscribe now. If you’re not sure, feel free to email us at support@gruntwork.io.

Your entire infrastructure. Defined as code. In about a day.
